form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Application to File Petition for Naturalization

full_text: popkin, shamir & greenberg LAW OFFICES INCORPORATED richard C. popkin June 2, 1975 ruth shamir bert d, greenberg leslie J. frank Immigration & Naturalization Service fred i fleming 300 North Los Angeles Street ernie sosnick Los Angeles, CA 90012 RE: WOLFSON, GEORGE - A19 055 851 Application to File Petition for Naturalization Gentlemen: Enclosed please find the following documents relative to the above=mentioned matter; - Form N-400 executed by the applicant; - Form G-325 executed by the applicant; - Form G-28 indicating our representation; - Fingerprint chart and three photographs of the applicant; Please review the foregoing documents and notify our office of your decision regarding same. Very truly yours, POPKIN, SHAMIR & GREENBERG, INC. My BERT D. GREENBERG BDG:gv encls. suite 1800 california federal building 5670 wilshire boulevard los angeles, california 90036 cable address - priority telephones (213) 933-9562 and 938-3268
